name: Gum-Gum King Cobra

trigger.text: Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 2 or less to the owner's hand.

text: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, if you have 4 or less cards in hand, that card gains +2000 power for this battle.

effect.text: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, if you have 4 or less cards in hand, that card gains +2000 power for this battle.
